I hereby retract my opnion and declare that we all pop bubble wrap at the slightest chance. Those in favor?

topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/532ae741636872226f6e0100#post_532ae741636872226f6e0100
I unfortunately haven't yet; cause the nearest theatre is I think a hour and a half away.  When it gets on netflix I will.



God damn it florida. . . You know how florida has a "stand your ground" law?  For those of you that are foreigners, basically stand your ground on the books is basically if someone is coming at you to attack you can pull out your gun and tell them to fuck off and the law was originally thought up with the reasoning of allowing women to defend themselves against attackers.  Wait, before this becomes a discussion about the law and how and the controversy around it here's something that will make everyone's blood boil instead; the law does not apply to women.

You heard that right; the law that was specifically created with the idea of so that women can defend themselves against violence does not apply to them.

Take it away bugs
!http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/506/772/97a.gif!
